Good Comments: Translations seriously need to be proofread and edited. So many mistakes.
Easy to read and understandable subs. There are quite a few spelling mistakes and lines that could be better phrased, but it doesn't stop you understanding what's going on.
spelling errors, missing words, extra letters, sometimes too fast to read
Hm... I just like them? I... guess...? o.o
Only a major mistake, in Kansaki's french in ep. 18. But that was because it was plot relevant. Nice subs

nice translation and i liked the way the subs looked like :P
